eventinfo: The 5G Orchestration & Service Assurance Digital Symposium is a two-day event featuring Heavy Reading’s Research Director, Jim Hodges. Join him alongside industry experts as they investigate in detail the impact of 5G on orchestration and service assurance systems and strategies to optimize their performance.

Speakerlist: ["Srini Gopalan", "Member of the Board of Management Deutsche Telekom AG and Spokesperson of the Board of Management of Telekom Deutschland GmbH "]

eventname: Connectivity redefined, cloud reimagined, telco reinvented
eventinfo: Network X is where the telecom and mobile industry comes together to spark powerful debates and connections. This is the new home of the long-running 5G World and Broadband World Forum, which will be joined by the newly launched Telco Cloud, designed to cover the full spectrum of the telecoms ecosystem. Not only is Network X supported by leading telco brands including Light Reading and Telecoms.com, it is also shaped by Founding Partners, who ensure the event represents the full industry. These three events combine to provide you with a truly universal view of the state of telco in 2022. The biggest part of this universe, is you, so get involved today.
Speakerlist: [["Alex Goldblum", "CEO, Eurofiber", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/alex-goldblum/"], ["Andrea Dona", "Chief Network Officer, Vodafone UK", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/392/"], ["Antje Williams", "Senior Vice President 5G Campus Networks, ", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/antje-williams/"], ["Babak Fouladi", "Board Member CTDO, KPN", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/babak-fouladi/"], ["Camilla Amundsen", "CMO, Fixed and TV, Telenor", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/camilla-amundsen/"], ["Enrique Rodriguez", "Chief Technology Officer, Liberty Global", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/enrique-rodriguez/"], ["Ibrahim Gedeon", "CTO, TELUS", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/ibrahim-gedeon/"], ["Ingeborg \u00d8fsthus", "CTO, Telenor Norway", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/ingeborg-ofsthus/"], ["Marc Allera", "Chief Executive Officer: Consumer, BT", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/marc-allera/"], ["Rob Shuter", "Chief Executive Officer, BT Enterprise", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/rob-shuter/"], ["Vinod Kumar", "CEO, Vodafone Business", "https://networkxevent.com/speaker/vinod-kumar/"]]
